arts.ttl: Brendan Rodgers' reveals Auston Trusty chat after Sky Sports' cameras caught Celtic boss' reaction to Dundee goal
arts.sum: Dundee took the lead at a corner where Celtic defender Auston Trusty failed to stay strong as Aaron Donnelly rose to nod home the goal. Celtic had to battle to a draw at Dundee despite going ahead twice in Tayside as Tony Docherty’s side gave Brendan Rodgers some food for thought late on at Dens Park.

arts.ttl: The £17m Celtic reason Tony Docherty is gushing with pride as Dundee 'heroes' drink in the praise
arts.sum: Three of Celtic's subs cost a combined £17m while Dundee had to turn to someone straight off his sick bed

arts.ttl: Adam Idah given 'personal' Celtic training by Hoops legend as struggling £9m striker’s sins listed
arts.sum: Neil Lennon is demanding more of the big money signing after an ineffectual first half at Dens Park

arts.ttl: Watch Celtic & Dundee share six goals in epic game
arts.sum: Watch the best of the action as Celtic score a stoppage-time penalty to deny Dundee a first win over them at Dens in 36 years.

arts.ttl: Rodgers offers update on Celtic transfers, explains what current team must do better
arts.sum: Celtic manager Brendan Rodgers hopes to receive more information about possible incomings.

arts.ttl: Luke McCowan reflects on Dundee return with Celtic, relieved he didn't celebrate goal
arts.sum: Luke McCowan scored the game’s first goal as he made his Dens Park return.

arts.ttl: Dundee 'made a Champions League team wobble'
arts.sum: Dundee manager Tony Docherty is proud of how his players performed in the 3-3 Scottish Premiership draw with leaders Celtic.

arts.ttl: Celtic 'too passive, too slow, not aggressive enough'
arts.sum: Manager Brendan Rodgers is frustrated with Celtic's second-half performance in their 3-3 Scottish Premiership draw at Dundee.

arts.ttl: Auston Trusty in firing line as Brendan Rodgers bemoans ‘soft’ defending
arts.sum: The centre-back was outmuscled for both Dundee’s second and third goals in a thrilling draw.

arts.ttl: Rodgers criticises 'really disappointing' Celtic, level not good enough vs Dundee
arts.sum: Brendan Rodgers wasn't happy with Celtic's second half performance.
